attributes.action: apologise for selling the nation's gold reserves at a knock down price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Without consulting the bank of england Gordon Grown as Chancellor sold off a large tract of Britain's gold reserves at the pitiful price of $282 per ounce.  He announced the sale beforehand and so depressed the price.  What has become of the proceeds of the sale of the nation's reserves?  This was a huge, costly and arrogant mistake.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
